sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, fill out a form, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, phone number, company information, and project details.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, process transactions, and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of certain communications from us.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@techrover.co.in
